activities: Flexco and its operating subsidiaries ("Flexco") receive personal information("PI")associated with residents of the European Union ("EU").  This PI may be received directly from individuals (in which Flexco acts as a "Data Collector") or from third parties (in which Flexco acts as a "Data Processor").  Flexco processes PI in order to hire and employ individuals and to process HR-related information as an employer
contactoff1: Office of Ethics and Business Conduct
industrysector: Agricultural Machinery & Equipment - (AGM)Mining Industry Equipment - (MIN)General Industrial Eqpt & Supplies - (GIE)
personaldata: Off-line, internal electronic data, manually processed data, human resource data
privacyprograms: Flexco is not a member of a privacy program
